description.en: NOIR is a token built on the SORA Network. NOIR is a phygital (physical + digital) wine token, limited to 777 tokens. Each token represents a single bottle of NOIR sparkling wine. Token holders can redeem 1 token for 1 bottle that is shipped to them via our noir.digital platform.
